title: Stage Lv7-P2-S10
description: Level 7 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: If I had studied medicine, I would be a doctor now.
If she were more organized, she wouldn't have missed the deadline.
learning_points: Level 7 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 만약 내가 의학을 공부했다면, 지금 의사가 되어 있을 것이다. (과거 조건, 현재 결과)
sentences.en: If I had studied medicine, I would be a doctor now.

sentences.kr: 만약 그녀가 더 체계적이라면, 마감일을 놓치지 않았을 것이다. (현재 조건, 과거 결과)
sentences.en: If she were more organized, she wouldn't have missed the deadline.

sentences.kr: 만약 우리가 그 회사에 투자했다면, 오늘 백만장자가 되어 있을 것이다.
sentences.en: If we had invested in that company, we would be millionaires today.

sentences.kr: 만약 그가 더 신중했다면, 지금 이런 재정적 어려움을 겪지 않을 것이다.
sentences.en: If he had been more cautious, he wouldn't be facing these financial difficulties now.

sentences.kr: 만약 그녀가 더 자신감이 있다면, 어제 그 기회를 놓치지 않았을 것이다.
sentences.en: If she were more confident, she wouldn't have missed that opportunity yesterday.

sentences.kr: 만약 회사가 기술에 일찍 투자했다면, 지금 시장의 선두주자가 되어 있을 것이다.
sentences.en: If the company had invested in technology early, it would be the market leader now.

sentences.kr: 만약 정부가 더 전향적이라면, 지난해 그런 경제적 손실을 입지 않았을 것이다.
sentences.en: If the government were more progressive, it wouldn't have suffered such economic losses last year.

sentences.kr: 만약 그들이 환경 문제를 더 일찍 인식했다면, 지금 이렇게 심각한 오염 문제에 직면하지 않을 것이다.
sentences.en: If they had recognized environmental issues earlier, they wouldn't be facing such severe pollution problems now.
